DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether oscillatory pattern of sympathetic nerve activity muscle is an efficient index for the prognosis of patients with heart failure.
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Value of Sympathetic Modulation in Patients With Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Patients with systolic heart failure and New York Heart Association (NYHA) Ischemic, hypertensive, or idiopathic etiology Left ventricular ejection fraction less than 40% Neuromuscular, Orthopedic, Neurologic and Pulmonary Diseases Renal failure Diabetes mellitus type II
